item.title: Time x Value
item.description: We all struggle with time-management. We want to do a 100 different things but we have only so many hours every day. At work most of our hours are governed by stkeholders and teammates. We are overwhelemed with tasks of all kinds. This is fine for an entry-level role, but as your grow in your career, it is important that you protect your time. As a senior engineer or a lead you are expected to deliver value for your product and for your org
